#konami-js

Watches for the konami code then fires a callback.

####On the keyboard
    ↑ ↑ ↓ ↓ ← → ← → B A ENTER

####As touch input
    ↑ ↑ ↓ ↓ ← → ← → TAP TAP TAP

##Installation

    npm install konami-js


##Usage

    var Konami = require('konami-js');

    new Konami(function(){
        alert('KONAMI!');
    });
